body_html: @siddharth-agrawal I'm leery of trying to GPUify all the range sampling ops unless you have a compelling need. They're quite intricate, and specifically intricate in the kind of way that's hard to do efficiently on GPU (doing them inefficiently on GPU is not interesting). It's all possible, but their has to be a need in order to accept that complexity into the codebase.
